price: 192. But if they cease, then Allâh is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
